title: Sell Hennessy Paradis
metaTitle: Sell Hennessy Paradis & Richard Hennessy | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Hennessy Paradis and Richard Hennessy Cognac. We buy Imperial, Rare, and limited editions. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Hennessy Paradis and Richard Hennessy.
introParagraph: Hennessy is the world's largest Cognac producer, and its top-tier releases are luxury icons. We purchase Hennessy Paradis, Paradis Imperial, and the flagship Richard Hennessy. Whether you have a modern bottling or an older release, we provide competitive offers.
pricingFactors: Old vs New bottling (Paradis Extra vs Paradis Rare)

faqs.question: Do you buy Richard Hennessy?
faqs.answer: Yes, Richard Hennessy is the top of the range and highly valuable.

faqs.question: What is Paradis Imperial?
faqs.answer: It is a more exclusive version of Paradis, selected from the finest eaux-de-vie. It commands a higher price.

faqs.question: Do you buy Hennessy XO?
faqs.answer: Refular Hennessy XO is generally not something we buy unless it is an older collectable bottling or limited edition.

faqs.question: Do I need the box?
faqs.answer: Yes, the presentation box is important for resale value, especially for Richard Hennessy.

faqs.question: Do you buy old Hennessy?
faqs.answer: Yes, we look for older 'JAS Hennessy' bottlings from the mid-20th century.

faqs.question: How do I ship a decanter?
faqs.answer: Secure the stopper so it doesn't move and crack the neck. Wrap the decanter heavily in bubble wrap before boxing.
